lead_paragraph: A report in the Slap Shot hockey column last Sunday about the first N.H.L. playoff meeting of Eric Staal of the Carolina Hurricanes and his brother Jordan of the Pittsburgh Penguins misstated their birth order in relation to their brother Marc, who plays for the Rangers. Eric is the oldest, followed by Marc and Jordan; Marc is not the youngest.
